com.loraiot.iot.comm

接口 Connection

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    SSLConnection, TCPConnection, UDPConnection

    public interface Connection
extends java.io.Serializable
    The class to acquire the connection to CSIF server.
    版本:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    10028484

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean disconnect()
      Method to disconnect from CSIF .
      java.lang.Object getConnection(java.net.InetAddress host, int port)
      Method to get the connection to server, acquire the connection clarified by detailed class.
      byte[] getData()
      Method to get the byte array data sent from CSIF.
      boolean isClosed()
      Method to test if the connection is closed.
      boolean putData(byte[] data)
      Method to put the byte array data to send to CSIF.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConnection

        java.lang.Object getConnection(java.net.InetAddress host,
                               int port)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Method to get the connection to server, acquire the connection clarified by detailed class.
        参数:
        host - The CSIF host address.
        port - The CSIF port.
        返回:
        The Connection object to use.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Connect Exception.

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Method to disconnect from CSIF .
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Connect Exception.

      • putData

        boolean putData(byte[] data)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Method to put the byte array data to send to CSIF.
        参数:
        data - Byte array usually encoded in UTF-8.
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Connect Exception.

      • getData

        byte[] getData()
        throws java.io.IOException
        Method to get the byte array data sent from CSIF.
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Connect Exception.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Method to test if the connection is closed.
        返回:
        The status of the connection.
